cucumber.api.java

Interface ObjectFactory


  • public interface ObjectFactory
    Minimal facade for Dependency Injection containers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addClass(Class<?> glueClass)
      Collects glue classes in the classpath.
      <T> T getInstance(Class<T> glueClass)
      Provides the glue instances used to execute the current scenario.
      void start()
      Instantiate glue code before scenario execution.
      void stop()
      Dispose glue code after scenario execution.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Instantiate glue code before scenario execution. Called once per scenario.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Dispose glue code after scenario execution. Called once per scenario.

      • addClass

        boolean addClass(Class<?> glueClass)
        Collects glue classes in the classpath. Called once on init.
        Parameters:
        glueClass - Glue class containing cucumber.api annotations (Before, Given, When, ...)
        Returns:
        true if stepdefs and hooks in this class should be used, false if they should be ignored.

      • getInstance

        <T> T getInstance(Class<T> glueClass)
        Provides the glue instances used to execute the current scenario. The instance can be prepared in start().
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of Glue class
        Parameters:
        glueClass - type of instance to be created.
        Returns:
        new Glue instance of type T
